instructions: ["Lie face down on the ground and place your forearms on the ground directly under your shoulders.", "With your feet in the stirrups, kick both feet into the TRX straps and hold the handles above your head.", "Tighten your abs, glutes, and legs to form a straight line from your head to your feet."]

name: TRX Hand Plank
instructions: ["Start by facing away from the TRX straps and placing your feet in the TRX handles with your palms on the ground.", "Lift your knees off the ground to begin the set.", "Engage your core and maintain this position for the desired amount of time, holding a steady plank."]

name: TRX Knee Tuck
instructions: ["Place your feet in the TRX stirrups and get in to a hand plank position.", "Pull your knees to your chest and flex your abs."]

name: TRX Mountain Climber
instructions: ["Start in a plank position with the TRX straps adjusted to mid-calf length. Place your feet in the TRX stirrups.", "Keep your abs engaged, and bring one knee towards your chest while keeping the other leg extended behind you.", "Switch legs, bringing the opposite knee towards your chest while keeping your abs engaged and your back straight."]

name: TRX Pike
instructions: ["Place your feet in the stirrups and get in to a plank position.", "Pull your hips straight up toward the ceiling.", "Lower your hips until you're back in a plank position."]

name: Kettlebell Russian Twist
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with your legs bent, knees together and feet raised slightly off the floor.", "Starting on one side and sitting up straight with your core muscles engaged, lift the kettlebell off the floor with both hands and bring it across your body to the other side, rotating your chest towards the floor as you do so.", "Tap the kettlebell lightly on the floor and bring the kettlebell back across your body to the starting position, rotating your chest towards the floor.", "Repeat, keeping the legs bent and feet raised throughout the exercise."]

name: Kettlebell Windmill
instructions: ["Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder width apart. Hold the kettlebell in one hand and extend your arm above your head.", "Keeping your legs straight and the kettlebell above your head, lower the relaxed arm towards the ground, twisting your body towards the side of the raised arm.", "Return to the starting potion, tilt your pelvis forward and repeat."]

name: Dumbbell Russian Twist
instructions: ["Sit on the floor and flex your knees and hips to a 90 degree angle.", "Your feet should be hovering off the ground. (If that's too hard start with heels on the floor)", "Rotate your upper spine to engage your obliques."]

name: Bodyweight Russian Twist
instructions: ["Hover your heels just off the ground.", "Stick your chest out and maintain a flat back. Make all the movement happen at your mid and upper spine.", "Point your chest to the left, then rotate at the spine until your chest is pointed right."]

name: Dumbbell Half Kneeling Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Take a half kneeling position. Start with the dumbbell by your knee on the side of the kneeling leg.", "Rotate at the upper spine, holding the dumbbell away from your body with nearly extended elbows."]

name: Plate Russian Twist
instructions: ["Start by sitting on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground", "Engage your core muscles by pulling your belly button toward your spine.", "Slowly twist your upper body to the right, keeping your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.", "Hold for a second and then twist to the left, holding for another second."]

name: Cobra Pose
instructions: ["Lie on your stomach with your legs extended behind you, feet hip-width apart.", "Place your palms on the ground next to your shoulders, with your elbows close to your sides.", "Inhale and press down through your palms, lifting your chest and shoulders off the ground while keeping your elbows close to your sides.", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, then release and repeat as desired."]

name: Urdhva Dhanurasana Wheel Pose
instructions: ["Lie down on your back with your feet hip-distance apart and your knees bent.", "Place your hands on the floor beside your head, fingertips pointing towards your shoulders.", "Push your feet and hands into the floor, lift your hips up and straighten your arms.", "Lift your chest towards the ceiling and hold the pose for a few breaths before lowering back down."]

name: Machine 45 Degree Back Extension
instructions: ["Position your thighs on the padding and hook your feet on the platform supports.", "Keeping your back straight, slowly bend at your waist until your legs and back are at a 45\u00b0 angle.", "Slowly raise your body to the starting position."]

name: Lower back Stretch Variation Four
instructions: ["Lay flat against the ground with your knees at an angle and your feet flat against the floor.", "Grab your legs just below the knees, and pull your legs towards your chest.", "Pause at the apex of the stretch, then return to the starting position."]

name: Lower back Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Lay on your back with your arms at either side.", "Raise your knees so that they are pointing straight towards the ceiling. Keeping your legs pressed together, rotate your hips to either side.", "Repeat this motion as necessary."]

name: Lower back Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Lay flat on the floor with your arms at either side.", "With one leg, hook one foot under the joint of your other leg.", "Rotate your hips so that your knees are pointing sideways, keeping your hooked leg flat against the floor.", "Pause at the apex of the stretch and repeat with your other leg."]

name: Lower back Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with the tops of your feet pointed and flat on the ground. Move your arms out in front of you in the diving position, placing your palms flat against the ground.", "With your arms fully extended, rest your buttocks on the heels of your feet, you can crawl your hands forward to extend the stretch if need be.", "Hold the extended position for a few seconds, and return to starting position."]

name: Supermans
instructions: ["Lie face down on the floor with your arms fully extended in front of you.", "Simultaneously raise your arms, legs and chest off of the floor and hold the position.", "Slowly lower your arms, legs and chest back to the starting position. Repeat."]

name: Plate Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, the plate in front of the feet, and the knees slightly bent.", "Bend the hips and knees to grip the plate with palms facing the body.", "Keeping the back straight, stand up while lifting the plate off the ground.", "Return the plate back to the starting position by bending the hips and knees, keeping control of the plate."]

name: Dumbbell Superman
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground on your stomach with your arms extended overhead. Hold a dumbbell with a neutral grip.", "Lift your legs and chest off the ground simultaneously and hold for a 1 count at the top.", "Relax your lower back and lower your legs and chest back to the floor."]

name: Happy Baby
instructions: ["Lie down on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.", "Lift your feet off the floor and bring your knees towards your chest.", "Reach inside your knees and hold onto the outside edges of your feet.", "Gently pull your knees towards your armpits and rock side to side for a few breaths."]

name: Sphinx Pose
instructions: ["Start by lying down on your stomach on a yoga mat or a comfortable surface.", "Place your elbows underneath your shoulders, keeping your forearms parallel to each other.", "Press your palms and forearms firmly into the ground to lift your chest up, while keeping your hips and legs relaxed.", "Make sure your shoulders are relaxed and away from your ears. Gently roll your shoulder blades down and back to open up your chest.", "Lengthen your spine by lifting the crown of your head towards the ceiling, while keeping your chin tucked in slightly."]

name: Traps mid back Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Sit on the ground and lay one leg flat and the other over the top.", "Hold your leg with the same side arm and slowly rotate your hips and back.", "Hold at the peak of the stretch, then slowly return to starting position.", "Switch sides and repeat."]

name: Traps mid back Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Repeat with your other arm.", "Stand up with your feet shoulder width apart. Place one arm across the front of your chest at shoulder height, press the forearm of your other arm above the elbow, hooking the stretching arm with your hand.", "Press the arm until it is straight and rotate your upper torso to engage the stretch even deeper."]

name: Cat Pose
instructions: ["Begin on your hands and knees with your wrists directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips.", "Inhale and arch your back, lifting your tailbone and head towards the ceiling, while lowering your belly towards the floor.", "Exhale and round your spine, tucking your chin towards your chest, and bringing your tailbone towards your knees.", "Repeat these movements, flowing smoothly between the two poses, for several breaths."]

name: Easy Seated Twist Pose
instructions: ["Begin seated with your legs extended in front of you.", "Begin seated with your legs extended in front of you.", "Bend your right knee and place your foot on the floor next to your left thigh.", "Bend your right knee and place your foot on the floor next to your left thigh.", "Inhale and reach your left arm up towards the ceiling.", "Inhale and reach your left arm up towards the ceiling.", "Exhale and twist to the right, placing your left elbow on the outside of your right knee. Hold for a few breaths and then repeat on the other side.", "Exhale and twist to the right, placing your left elbow on the outside of your right knee. Hold for a few breaths and then repeat on the other side."]

name: Revolved Side Angle Pose With Prayer Hands
keywords: ["Revolved Side Angle Pose With Prayer Hands", "Yoga"]
instructions: ["Begin in Warrior II pose, with your right foot forward and your left foot back.", "Bring your hands together in a prayer position at your heart.", "Exhale and twist your torso to the right, placing your left elbow on the outside of your right knee.", "Hold for several breaths and then repeat on the other side."]

name: Revolved Side Angle Pose With Prayer Hands Beginner
keywords: ["Revolved Side Angle Pose With Prayer Hands Beginner", "Yoga"]
instructions: ["Begin in a low lunge position with your right foot forward and your left knee on the ground.", "Bring your hands together in a prayer position at your heart.", "Exhale and twist your torso to the right, placing your left elbow on the outside of your right knee.", "Hold for several breaths and then repeat on the other side."]

name: Seated Twist
instructions: ["Begin seated with your legs extended in front of you.", "Bend your right knee and place your foot on the floor next to your left thigh.", "Inhale and reach your left arm up towards the ceiling.", "Exhale and twist to the right, placing your left elbow on the outside of your right knee. Hold for a few breaths and then repeat on the other side."]

name: Barbell Landmine Side Bend
overview: SetupTo set up for a barbell landmine side bend exercise, you will need a barbell and a landmine attachment. If you do not have a landmine attachment, you can also use a sandbag, a heavy bag, or a bench.Foot PlacementStand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your side to the barbell.How to do a
instructions: ["Stand straight and hold the end of the Barbell", "Keep your hips and shoulders facing forward, bend to one side slowly", "Return to the upright position.", "Switch hands and repeat."]

name: Dumbbell Wood Chopper
overview: How To Perform The Dumbbell Wood ChopperSetupGrab a single dumbbell and hold it horizontally with the ends of the dumbbells in each hand. Use a wider than shoulder width stance. We have to hit both sides of the obliques with this exercise. So we will begin with going right to left. You can perform e
instructions: ["Stand with a shoulder width stance. Begin with the dumbbell near one of your quads.", "Rotate at your upper spine to engage the obliques.", "You can pivot your back foot to keep from generating too much torque at the knee."]

name: Kettlebell Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder width apart and hold the kettle bell with both hands against your hip.", "Keeping your arms straight, swing the kettlebell upwards and across your body towards your shoulder, raising the kettlebell to head height rotating your hips as you do so.", "Return to the starting position and repeat."]

name: Cable Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Set the cable at about nipple level. Use a handle attachment.", "Face sideways, then rotate your torso with your arms extended against the resistance.", "After completing your given number of reps, face the opposite direction and repeat."]

name: Band Pallof Press
instructions: ["Place the band at an anchor point that is shoulder height. Take a few steps away until the band is taut.", "Start with your fingers interlocked around the band and your fists connected to your chest.", "Extend at the elbows pressing the band away from your body until your elbows are fully extended."]

name: Cable Pallof Press
overview: How To Perform The Cable Pallof PressSetupYou want the cable at roughly nipple height. Use a d handle attachment or a nylon plastic handle. Either interlock your fingers or place one set of fingers over the other. Whichever is more comfortable.Take a couple of steps away from the cable stack and fac
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment, set the cable at nipple level, walk a few steps away, and face sideways.", "Start with both hands on the handle and your fists against your chest.", "Press the handle forward until your elbows are fully extended, then pull the handle back to your chest."]

name: Side Plank Up Down
instructions: ["Start with your elbow and hip on the ground. Either neutral fist or flat hand on the ground.", "Begin in a side plank position, and then drop your hips to the floor.", "Pull your hips back to the ceiling to finish the rep."]

name: Side Plank Reach Through
instructions: ["Begin in an elbow side plank position.", "Reach for the ceiling with your off hand.", "Rotate at the mid and upper spine and reach through the open space between the floor and your torso.", "Reach backwards, and then rotate back into the starting position."]

name: Elbow Side Plank
instructions: ["Press your elbow into the floor.", "Pick your hips up off the ground and maintain this position for the allotted amount of time.", "Make sure you don't let your chest fall forward or backward."]

name: Hand Side Plank
instructions: ["Press your hand into the ground and pick up your hip off the ground.", "Open your chest and maintain this position for the allotted amount of time."]

name: Dumbbell Kneeling Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Start in a kneeling position with your shoulder blades pulled back.", "The dumbbell should begin by one of your hips.", "Rotate at the spine and bring the dumbbell from your hip, 180 degrees around your body. The dumbbell should land at eye level."]

name: Dumbbell Overhead Side Bend
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell overhead.", "From this starting position, bend to the side as far as you can while keeping your feet planted and your core engaged."]

name: Dumbbell Side Plank Up Down
instructions: ["Start by lying on your side with your feet stacked on top of each other and a dumbbell on your hip.", "Place your bottom elbow on the ground beneath your shoulder and engage your core to raise your hips off the ground.", "Your hips will do all the moving. Think, \"hips up, hips down.\""]

name: Dumbbell Hand Side Plank
instructions: ["Start by lying on your side with your feet stacked on top of each other and a dumbbell on your hip.", "Place your bottom hand on the ground beneath your shoulder and engage your core to raise your hips off the ground.", "From this starting position, hold the side plank position for the desired amount of time, making sure to keep your body straight and your hips level."]

name: Plate Standing Twist
instructions: ["Stand with a plate extended away from your body. Elbows mostly extended.", "Rotate at the upper spine while keeping your lumbar spine in a neutral position.", "Do not let the plate go behind your body."]

name: Plate Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Stand with a shoulder width stance. Begin with the plate near one of your quads.", "Rotate at your upper spine to engage the obliques.", "You can pivot your back foot to keep from generating too much torque at the knee."]

name: Dumbbell Long Lever Russian Twist
instructions: ["Start by sitting on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground. Hold a dumbbell in both hands with your arms extended straight in front of you.", "Twist your torso to the right, bringing the dumbbell towards the ground, then return to the center. Repeat on the left side, twisting to the left and bringing the dumbbell towards the ground.", "Continue this twisting motion, alternating sides, for the desired number of repetitions. Keep your core engaged and avoid swinging your arms to generate momentum."]

name: TRX Forearm Side Plank
instructions: ["Lie on your side with your legs straight and your feet resting in the TRX foot cradles.", "Prop yourself up on your forearm and engage your core to maintain a straight line from your head to your feet."]

name: TRX Oblique Crunch
instructions: ["Place your feet in the TRX stirrups and get in to a hand plank position.", "Pull both knees to your right elbow.", "Extend your legs back to the starting position, then pull both knees to the left elbow."]

name: Gate Pose Variation Arm Extended on Side
keywords: ["Gate Pose Variation Arm Extended on Side", "Yoga"]
instructions: ["Start on your knees and extend your right leg out to the side.", "Raise your right arm above your head and reach towards the left side of the room.", "Gently bend your body to the left side and rest your left hand on your left thigh.", "Look up towards your right hand and hold the pose for a few breaths before switching sides."]

name: Revolved Head To Knee
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.", "Bend your right knee and bring your heel towards your perineum.", "Place your left hand on the outside of your right knee and twist your body to the right.", "Reach your right hand towards your left foot and look up towards the ceiling. Hold the pose for a few breaths before switching sides."]

name: Seated Side Bend Pose
instructions: ["Sit comfortably on the floor with your legs crossed.", "Inhale and raise your right arm above your head.", "As you exhale, bend your body to the left side and rest your left hand on the ground.", "Look up towards the ceiling and hold the pose for a few breaths. Then switch sides and repeat the pose on the other side."]

name: Supine Twist Lying
instructions: ["Lie down on your back with your arms stretched out to your sides.", "Bend your right knee and bring it towards your chest.", "Slowly twist your body to the left side, bringing your right knee across your body towards the ground on the left side.", "Look towards your right hand and hold the pose for a few breaths before switching sides."]

name: Wild Thing Pose
instructions: ["Start in a downward facing dog position.", "Shift your weight onto your left hand and foot, and lift your right leg towards the ceiling.", "Slowly bend your right knee and shift your weight onto your right hand as you open up your chest towards the ceiling.", "Look towards your right hand and hold the pose for a few breaths before switching sides."]
